page.title: 19TEENAGE LEISURE TIME (1)
page.content: {CHILDREN FROM KING RICHARD III SCHOOL} Many children seem to enjoy the Saturday shopping trip into Leicester where visits to 'Pizzaland' or 'Brucciani's' are much appreciated. T.V. and video recorders are the commonest form of indoor recreation, although a large percentage do help with household chores. Some children have part-time jobs (early morning paper rounds are common) while a few help self-employed parents on Satur- days. Weekends are also used for visits to relatives, which most of the children enjoy. In the evenings girls were happy to meet friends and gossip, while the boys enjoyed playing football. Watch- ing professional sport is not popular because of the high admission cost and a fear of violence. Only 1 child supp- -orted Leicester City F.C. regularly.
